message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $150. I think you'll find it's a great deal for its value.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $150 is too high for me. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go lower than $130. This product is high-quality and I'm confident it will be valuable for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you considering my offer. While I believe the product is good, $130 is still a bit too high for my budget. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $100?
